Parameters.Name: MEDIA-2-1-7 GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: one VSC( GetCapabilities)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is not supported One VSC, one VEC MaximumNumberOfProfiles=10 GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=1

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: one VSC( GetCapabilities, GetServices)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported One VSC, one VEC GetCapabilities has no extention GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=1, MaximumNumberOfProfile="10"

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: one VSC(GetServices)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is not supported GetServices is supported One VSC, 2 VECs GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=2, MaximumNumberOfProfiles="8"

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: no MaxProfiles(GetServices)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is not supported GetServices is supported, no MaxProfiles in the response One VSC, 2 VECs GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=2, MaximumNumberOfProfile="8"

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: 3 VSCs( GetCapabilities)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is not supported 3 VSCs TotalNumber for the first and the second VSC is less than number of VECs TotalNumber for the third VSC = number of VECs MaximumNumberOfProfiles=10

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response: no maxProfiles( GetCapabilities)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported, no MaxProfiles in the response GetServices is not supported One VSC, one VEC

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response: TotalNumber is greater than MaximumNumberOfProfiles( GetCapabilities)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is not supported 4 VSCs TotalNumber for the third VSC = 4 MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
MEDIA-2-1-7 GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Media service Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Media service capabilities from Device service Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the DUT returned Media capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Getting video encoder configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Validating video encoder configurations STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Getting video source configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating video source configurations STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Getting guaranteed number of video encoder instances Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Compare guaranteed total number of video encoder instances and total number of video encoder configurations STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Compare guaranteed total number of video encoder instances and maximum number of profiles STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Getting guaranteed number of video encoder instances Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Compare guaranteed total number of video encoder instances and total number of video encoder configurations STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Compare guaranteed total number of video encoder instances and maximum number of profiles STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Getting guaranteed number of video encoder instances Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Compare guaranteed total number of video encoder instances and total number of video encoder configurations Guaranteed total number of video encoder instances is greater than total number of video encoder configurations STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response: TotalNumber is greater than MaximumNumberOfProfiles(GetServices)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is not supported GetServices is supported 4 VSCs TotalNumber for the third VSC = 4 MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response: TotalNumber is greater than MaximumNumberOfProfiles(GetServices and GetCapabilities)
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported 4 VSCs TotalNumber for the third VSC = 4 MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3 in GetServiceCapabilities MaximumNumberOfProfiles=10 in GetCapabilities

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response: TotalNumber is greater than MaximumNumberOfProfiles(GetServices and GetCapabilities)- 2
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported 4 VSCs TotalNumber for the third VSC = 4 MaximumNumberOfProfiles=10 in GetServiceCapabilities MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3 in GetCapabilities

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response: TotalNumber is greater than MaximumNumberOfProfiles(GetServices and GetCapabilities)- 3
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported 4 VSCs TotalNumber for the third VSC = 4 MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3 in GetServiceCapabilities MaximumNumberOfProfiles=3 in GetCapabilities

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: TotalNumber is greater than number of VECs
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported One VSC GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=10 number of VECs=1 MaximumNumberOfProfile="10"

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: TotalNumber is equall to number of VECs
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is supported One VSC GuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances=3 number of VECs=3 MaximumNumberOfProfile="10"

Test.TestName: GET GUARANTEED NUMBER OF VIDEO ENCODER INSTANCES AND GET VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION OPTIONS CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Incorrect response with Options.JPEG
Test.Description: GetCapabilities is supported GetServices is not supported VSCs - 3 GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptions has Options.JPEG element, All GetGuaranteedNumberOfVideoEncoderInstances has JPEG elements with value is 0
